## Part 3

```{r independent var}
ggplot(df, aes(yoni_total)) + geom_histogram()
ggplot(df, aes(BES_total)) + geom_histogram()
ggplot(df, aes(yoni_total, BES_total)) + geom_point()
ggplot(df, aes(HCT_accuracy)) + geom_histogram()
ggplot(df, aes(MAIA_total)) + geom_histogram()
ggplot(df, aes(HCT_accuracy, MAIA_total)) + geom_point()
```

```{r dependent var}
ggplot(df, aes(instruction, DT_RT)) + geom_boxplot()
ggplot(df, aes(instruction, DT_confidence)) + geom_boxplot()
ggplot(df, aes(condition, DT_RT)) + geom_boxplot()
ggplot(df, aes(condition, DT_confidence)) + geom_boxplot()
```

```{r}
df %>% 
  group_by(ID, condition, instruction) %>% 
  summarise(confidence = mean(DT_confidence, na.rm = TRUE),
            yoni_total = mean(yoni_total, na.rm = TRUE)) %>% #create a new df for plot
  ggplot(aes(x = yoni_total, y = confidence, colour = instruction)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm") + 
  facet_wrap(~condition)
```
